snippet: For more than 100 put out of work by cancellation of the musical, the hits are both financial and emotional.
abstract: More than 100 cast and crew members are impacted both financially and emotionally when the long delayed Broadway production Rebecca is finally called off.
lead_paragraph: For more than 100 put out of work by cancellation of the musical, the hits are both financial and emotional.

headline.seo: Failure of Musical ‘Rebecca’ Costs More Than Money
headline.main: Demise of ‘Rebecca’ Costs More Than Money
headline.print_headline: Demise of ‘Rebecca’ Costs More Than Money
